verses.verse: The <S%H4853>burden<s%> of the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> for <S%H3478>Israel<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, which <S%H5186>stretches<s%> forth the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and lays the <S%H3245>foundation<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and <S%H3335>forms<s%> the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%> inside <S%H7130>him<s%>.

<S%H7760>Behold<s%>, I will make <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H5592>cup<s%> of <S%H7478>trembling<s%> unto all the <S%H5971>people<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, when they shall be in the <S%H4692>siege<s%> both against <S%H3063>Judah<s%> and against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And in that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> a <S%H4614>burdensome<s%> <S%H68>stone<s%> for all <S%H5971>people<s%>: all that <S%H6006>burden<s%> themselves with it shall be cut in <S%H8295>pieces<s%>, though all the <S%H1471>people<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%> be gathered together against <S%H622>it<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%>, <S%H5002>says<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%>, I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> every <S%H5483>horse<s%> with <S%H8541>astonishment<s%>, and his <S%H7392>rider<s%> with <S%H7697>madness<s%>: and I will <S%H6491>open<s%> my <S%H5869>eyes<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%>, and will <S%H5221>strike<s%> every <S%H5483>horse<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> with <S%H5788>blindness<s%>.

And the <S%H441>governors<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> shall <S%H559>say<s%> in their <S%H3820>heart<s%>, The <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be my <S%H556>strength<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> of <S%H6635>hosts<s%> their <S%H430>God<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> will I <S%H7760>make<s%> the <S%H441>governors<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> like a <S%H3595>hearth<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> among the <S%H6086>wood<s%>, and like a <S%H3940>torch<s%> of <S%H784>fire<s%> in a <S%H5995>sheaf<s%>; and they shall <S%H398>devour<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> round <S%H5439>about<s%>, on the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> and on the <S%H8040>left<s%>: and <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> shall be <S%H3427>inhabited<s%> again in her own <S%H3389>place<s%>, even in Jerusalem.

The <S%H3068>Lord<s%> also shall <S%H3467>save<s%> the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> <S%H7223>first<s%>, that the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> and the <S%H8597>glory<s%> of the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> do not <S%H1431>magnify<s%> themselves against <S%H3063>Judah<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1598>defend<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>; and he that is <S%H3782>feeble<s%> among them at that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall be as <S%H1732>David<s%>; and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> shall be as <S%H430>God<s%>, as the <S%H4397>angel<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> before <S%H6440>them<s%>.
And it shall come to pass in that <S%H3117>day<s%>, that I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> to <S%H8045>destroy<s%> all the <S%H1471>nations<s%> that <S%H935>come<s%> against <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>.

And I will <S%H8210>pour<s%> upon the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%>, and upon the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H2580>grace<s%> and of <S%H8469>supplications<s%>: and they shall <S%H5027>look<s%> upon me whom they have <S%H1856>pierced<s%>, and they shall <S%H4553>mourn<s%> for <S%H5594>him<s%>, as one mourns for his <S%H3173>only<s%> <S%H4843>son<s%>, and shall be in bitterness for <S%H4843>him<s%>, as one that is in bitterness for his <S%H1060>firstborn<s%>.

In that <S%H3117>day<s%> shall there be a <S%H1431>great<s%> <S%H4553>mourning<s%> in <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%>, as the <S%H4553>mourning<s%> of <S%H1910>Hadadrimmon<s%> in the <S%H1237>valley<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddon<s%>.

And the <S%H776>land<s%> shall <S%H5594>mourn<s%>, <S%H4940>every<s%> <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H905>apart<s%>; the <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H802>apart<s%>, and their wives <S%H4940>apart<s%>; the family of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H5416>Nathan<s%> <S%H802>apart<s%>, and their wives apart;

The <S%H4940>family<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3878>Levi<s%> <S%H802>apart<s%>, and their wives <S%H4940>apart<s%>; the family of <S%H8097>Shimei<s%> <S%H802>apart<s%>, and their wives apart;
All the <S%H4940>families<s%> that <S%H7604>remain<s%>, every <S%H4940>family<s%> <S%H802>apart<s%>, and their wives apart.
